Two federal courts have largely upheld the law, but a Virginia judge ruled in December that a provision requiring all Americans to buy insurance was unconstitutional. Republicans smell blood. Now that a federal judge has shown the individual mandate in Barack ObamaCare to be unconstitutional, it's time to repeal it lock, stock and barrel, said Mike Pence , R-Ind., who is pondering a run for Barack Obama . In fact while Eric Schmidt had his hand on the helm, values were changed to go where the money was. News of the changes overshadowed an otherwise solid financial report for Google. , Farrington High School officials are disappointed- but not skeptical about the reason- that Michael Vick , here for Sunday's Pro Bowl, canceled a visit to the school that had been set for tomorrow. Tabloid editors are also known to keep close watch over their reporters. No one who knows how a newspaper works, let alone a well-run British newspaper, has ever been able to understand for one second why a very effective editor wouldn't have at least asked his royal reporter where a stream of very strong scoops had come from, said an editor at another tabloid who asked not to be quoted by name because he was not authorized to speak publicly to the press. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way.
